articles.author: Alexander Bolton
articles.title: Markwayne Mullin defends conduct: ‘Every now and then, you need to get punched in the face’ - The Hill
articles.description: Sen. Markwayne Mullin (R-Okla.), the former mixed martial arts fighter who challenged a labor leader to a brawl in the middle of a Senate hearing room Tuesday, says there’s a long history of violence in American politics, claiming in an interview: “You used t…
